Name: Broken Rime's Echo
Title: Icy Song, Distant Realm: Broken Rime's Echo
Desc: "Past the ice-sealed door, walking down the corridors to the depths, he will break off a branch of silver-white, and bring hope to the snowy land."

Talent.Name: Broken Rime's Echo
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
